seo.description: Moving from Germany to UK post-Brexit. Full customs clearance DE→UK, Transfer of Residence relief. Channel Tunnel, door-to-door.

og.title: Moving from Germany to UK — Post-Brexit, Door-to-Door
og.description: Full customs clearance, Transfer of Residence relief. Channel Tunnel or ferry.

hero.subtitle: We were the official carrier of the Queen of Britain. Post-Brexit moving with full customs clearance on both sides. Channel Tunnel (35 min) or ferry. Door-to-door in 5–8 days. Transfer of Residence duty relief for permanent relocations.

process.title: How your move to the UK works
process.subtitle: Since Brexit, full customs clearance is required on both sides — EU export and UK import. Channel crossing via Eurotunnel or ferry.

items.text: Consultation — volume assessment, inventory preparation for EU customs and UK Border Force.
Packing with EN labelling — numbered items for customs inspection. UK Border Force may open any box.
Export documentation — Ausfuhranmeldung preparation and HMRC inventory.
EU export — Ausfuhranmeldung. Filed in Germany before departure.
Channel Tunnel (35 min) or Dover–Calais ferry (90 min). We choose the optimal option.
UK import — Transfer of Residence (ToR) relief. Duty-free import for permanent relocations.
London, Manchester, Birmingham, Edinburgh, Cardiff — any UK address.
UK building expertise — Victorian terraces, narrow staircases, bay windows. No challenge too tricky.
Unpacking, assembly, placement. Packaging removal included.

faq.title: FAQ: Moving from Germany to the UK
faq.subtitle: Everything about post-Brexit moving

items.q: Is customs clearance needed after Brexit?
items.a: Yes. The UK has left the EU — export declaration from Germany and import clearance in the UK are both required. We handle everything.
HMRC programme for duty-free import of personal belongings when permanently relocating to the UK. Requires 12+ months residence abroad.
Road + tunnel: from ~€400/m³. One-bedroom (~10 m³) — from €4,000. Includes both customs clearances.
Road: 5–8 days. Sea: 14–25 days. Air: 1–2 days.

items.q: Do I need a visa for shipping belongings?
items.a: Not for the goods. But ToR relief requires proof of right to reside (visa, settled status).
We arrange parking suspension with the local Council. Included in the price.
Tunnel: 35 min, faster. Ferry: cheaper but 90 min + waiting. We recommend tunnel for most moves.
Restrictions since Brexit: no commercial quantities, declaration needed. Personal items are fine.

items.q: How do I track my shipment?
items.a: GPS tracking including the Channel crossing. Notifications at each customs point.

items.q: Do you serve Scotland and Wales?
items.a: Yes. Edinburgh, Glasgow, Cardiff, Belfast — we deliver across the entire UK.
